text: Lawrence David Biittner (July 27, 1946 â€“ January 2, 2022) was an American professional baseball player. He played 14 seasons in Major League Baseball as an outfielder and first baseman. He played for the Washington Senators/Texas Rangers, Montreal Expos, Chicago Cubs and Cincinnati Reds. Biitner died on January 2, 2022 at the age of 75.Former Cubs outfielder Larry Biittner has passed away ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Texas Rangers players Category:Montreal Expos players Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Sportspeople from Iowa
title: Larry Biittner
